title: Avengers: Endgame
description: After the devastating events of Avengers: Infinity War, the universe is in ruins. With the help of remaining allies, the Avengers assemble once more in order to reverse Thanos' actions and restore balance to the universe.

genre.name: Action
genre.description: A form of genre fiction whose subject matter is characterized by emphasis on exciting action sequences.

director.name: Anthony Russo
director.bio: Collectively known as the Russo brothers are American directors, producers, and screenwriters.

title: Spider-Man: No Way Home
description: When a spell goes wrong, dangerous foes from other worlds start to appear, forcing Peter to discover what it truly means to be Spider-Man.

genre.name: Action
genre.description: A form of genre fiction whose subject matter is characterized by emphasis on exciting action sequences.

director.name: Jon Watts
director.bio: An American film director, producer and screenwriter.

title: Ip Man 2
description: This film inspired by a true story, Wing Chun martial arts master Ip Man (Donnie Yen) and his family are moving from Foshan, China, to Hong Kong, where Ip aspires to create a school so that he may teach his fighting techniques to a new generation. However, he finds resistance from an asthmatic Hung Ga master named Hong Zhen Nan (Sammo Hung). Soon, Ip is drawn into a treacherous world of corruption as well as a fateful showdown with a merciless boxer known as the Twister (Darren Shahlavi).

genre.name: Action
genre.description: A form of genre fiction whose subject matter is characterized by emphasis on exciting action sequences.

director.name: Wilson Yip
director.bio: A Hong Kong actor, filmmaker and screenwriter.

title: Rush Hour
description: A loyal and dedicated Hong Kong Inspector teams up with a reckless and loudmouthed L.A.P.D. detective to rescue the Chinese Consul's kidnapped daughter, while trying to arrest a dangerous crime lord along the way.

genre.name: Action
genre.description: A form of genre fiction whose subject matter is characterized by emphasis on exciting action sequences.

director.name: Brett Ratner
director.bio: An American film director and producer.

title: Interstellar
description: Set in a dystopian future where humanity is embroiled in a catastrophic blight and famine, the film follows a group of astronauts who travel through a wormhole near Saturn in search of a new home for humankind.

genre.name: Sci-Fi
genre.description: A film genre that uses speculative, fictional science-based depictions of phenomena that are not fully accepted by mainstream science.

director.name: Christopher Nolan
director.bio: Christopher Nolan is an Academy Award-winning movie director and screenwriter who's helmed several hit films, including Inception, The Dark Knight, Interstellar, and Oppenheimer.

title: Spirited Away
description: Chihiro's family is moving to a new house, but when they stop on the way to explore an abandoned village, her parents undergo a mysterious transformation and Chihiro is whisked into a world of fantastic spirits ruled over by the sorceress Yubaba.

genre.name: Fantasy
genre.description: A genre of speculative fiction involving magical elements, typically set in a fantasy world and usually inspired by mythology or folklore.

director.name: Hayao Miyazaki
director.bio: A Japanese animator, filmmaker, and manga artist.

title: Your Name
description: A teenage boy and girl embark on a quest to meet each other for the first time after they magically swap bodies.

genre.name: Romance
genre.description: A genre fiction novel that primary focuses on the relationship and romantic love between two people, typically with an emotionally satisfying and optimistic ending.

title: Inception
description: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O., but his tragic past may doom the project and his team to disaster.

genre.name: Sci-Fi
genre.description: A film genre that uses speculative, fictional science-based depictions of phenomena that are not fully accepted by mainstream science.

director.name: Christoper Nolan
director.bio: Christopher Nolan is an Academy Award-winning movie director and screenwriter who's helmed several hit films, including Inception, The Dark Knight, Interstellar, and Oppenheimer.

title: Fearless
description: After a terrible tragedy, a martial artist (Jet Li) retreats to a remote village to gain a new appreciation for the important things in life, but when he returns to the city to reconcile his past with the present, he gets caught up in a duel to the death defending China's honor.

genre.name: Action
genre.description: A form of genre fiction whose subject matter is characterized by emphasis on exciting action sequences.

director.name: Ronny Yu
director.bio: A Hong Kong film director, producer, and movie writer.

title: The Karate Kid
description: Work causes a single mother to move to China with her young son; in his new home, the boy embraces kung fu, taught to him by a master.

genre.name: Action
genre.description: A form of genre fiction whose subject matter is characterized by emphasis on exciting action sequences.
